What kind of work do you do?

DialogueNode.Text: It's alright. I get it.

DialogueOption.Text: Do you have a family? A husband or kids?
What kind of work do you do?

DialogueNode.Text: Just my daughter and I.

DialogueOption.Text: What kind of work do you do?
Really? I have a friend who is also a single mother. It is tough isn't it?

DialogueNode.Text: Yeah, it can be challenging. How's your friend managing?

DialogueOption.Text: Oh, she just lost her job and the kid is a menace.
Luckily, she's getting by. But let's get back to you. What kind of work do you do?

DialogueNode.Text: That's terrible! Is the father not supporting her?

No, he's long gone! Same case with you right?
He is. But let's get back to the interview.

Let's get back to the interview instead.

DialogueOption.Text: Which applications do you use for your shopping?

DialogueNode.Text: Hmm, I use Freshly for my everyday shopping. However sometimes I don’t find all the products and I need and go to a physical store as well.
DialogueNode.Thoughts: Just thinking about Freshly now.

DialogueOption.Text: Tell me about Freshly. What do you like about this application?

DialogueNode.Text: Yes. I would recommend it.

DialogueOption.Text: Do you think online shopping helps you save money, by buying items that aren’t readily necessary?
Let’s take Freshly as an example. Tell me about what makes shopping there comfortable?

DialogueNode.Text: Well, it usually has a wide product range. I like that they also have a fast delivery and I can choose what time they arrive.

DialogueOption.Text: What times do you usually like your deliveries?
Do you think this is one of the reasons why you like online shopping?
Do you think online shopping helps you save money, by buying items that aren’t readily necessary?

DialogueNode.Text: I prefer evenings, since I work such long days and I don’t have time to buy groceries or receive them during the day.

DialogueOption.Text: Do you think this is one of the reasons why you like online shopping?
What other reasons, do you think, make online grocery shopping appealing to you?

DialogueNode.Text: Yes definitely, having groceries delivered to me at my chosen time helps so much and makes my life a bit easier.

DialogueOption.Text: What other reasons, do you think, make online grocery shopping appealing to you?

DialogueNode.Text: Well, this is the main reason... [PAUSE] I also like shopping online, because I can do it from my own home and there are no distractions. I often get distracted when going to a store and buy things I don’t need.

DialogueOption.Text: Let’s take Freshly as an example. Tell me about what makes shopping there comfortable?

DialogueNode.Text: It has all these different food categories and I can find all the products I need under them, but using the search functionality makes finding things so much easier. This is something you can’t do in a physical store, you’d have to wander the isles or ask a salesperson, where the item you want is.

DialogueOption.Text: When you start shopping online, do you use search a lot?

DialogueNode.Text: Hmm...[PAUSE] Well usually I have an idea what I want to cook before i go to the app. Then I start by going through the recipe and use the search to find the items.
